response.overview: The DVD contains all films Ed van der Elsken has made in Amsterdam as a streetphotographer and at home in the Koningsstraat, plus two short documentaries about Van der Elsken. Running time 2 hours and 43 minutes. Dutch spoken, English subtitled. Included booklet English/Dutch:  Intro My Amsterdam  Armoede, Afbraak en Waterlooplein 1962-1964  Lieverdjes 1963  Welkom in het leven, lieve kleine 1965  Fietsen 1965  Hee Poppelepee 1967  Dia show Amsterdam 1976  Daan Doris 1981  Een fotograaf filmt Amsterdam  extra: Ed van der Elsken's Amsterdam door Walter Stokman 2005
response.title: My Amsterdam
